Label.en: There's also a contrast in energy...
Label.fr: Il y a aussi un contraste dans les énergies...
Label.es: There's also a contrast in energy...
Label.zh: There's also a contrast in energy...

Label.en: Compare the loud, active characters in the background, and the orange sun
Label.fr: Compare les personnages agités au fond, ainsi que le soleil orange
Label.es: Compare the loud, active characters in the background, and the orange sun
Label.zh: Compare the loud, active characters in the background, and the orange sun

Label.en: To the quiet, still scene in the foreground, with it's peaceful palette
Label.fr: A la scène silencieuse du premier plan, avec sa palette de couleurs paisibles
Label.es: To the quiet, still scene in the foreground, with it's peaceful palette
Label.zh: To the quiet, still scene in the foreground, with it's peaceful palette

Label.en: Finally, the topic of Christian persecution was relevant for Delaroche!
Label.fr: Au final, le thème de la persécution et de la grâce chrétienne était important pour Delaroche
Label.es: Finally, the topic of Christian persecution was relevant for Delaroche!
Label.zh: Finally, the topic of Christian persecution was relevant for Delaroche!

Label.en: Agreed... it's such a moving painting
Label.fr: Je suis d'accord...c'est une peinture émouvante
Label.es: Agreed... it's such a moving painting
Label.zh: Agreed... it's such a moving painting

Label.en: So... lastly... the topic of Christian persecution was especially relevant for Delaroche!
Label.fr: Au bout du compte... le thème de la persécution et de la grâce chrétienne était important pour Delaroche!
